item.title: MicroSense - A Deep Learning Android App for Cell Counting
item.description: Motivation Numerous biology and medical procedure involve counting cells from images taken with microscope. Counting cells reveals the concentration of bacteria and viruses and gives vital information on the progress of a disease. To accomplish the counting, a device known as the hemocytometer or a counting chamber is used. The hemocytometer creates volumetric grid to divide each region on the image for accurate counting. The following image shows an image taken from a hemocytometer.
